title: Identity and Access Management — MFA for Privileged Workloads
intent: Ensure high-risk users confirm identity via MFA and enforce adaptive challenges on privileged sessions.
automation_hints: Trigger automatic adaptive MFA challenge after anomalous login context
Temporarily revoke session tokens if MFA fails repeatedly
recommended_actions: Integrate risk-based policies into identity provider

title: Email Security — Phishing Resilience
intent: Reduce phishing victim count by blocking weaponized emails, isolating attachments, and notifying recipients.
automation_hints: Tag suspicious inbound emails and quarantine attachments
Notify SOC when high-risk emails bypass heuristics
recommended_actions: Enable sandboxing for attachments from untrusted senders
Circuit-break high-risk URLs and alert recipients

title: Endpoint Detection and Response
intent: Detect bulk credential dumping and unusual process chains within endpoint fleets.
automation_hints: Trigger remote shell for forensic capture when LSA secrets read
Correlate new service creation with privilege escalation alerts
recommended_actions: Deploy EDR agents with kernel sensors on all finance workstations
Build automation to isolate infected hosts within minutes

title: Data Loss Prevention — Structured Controls
intent: Block or redact sensitive data exfiltration and alert when anomalous exports happen.
automation_hints: Throttle large outbound transfers containing sensitive file signatures
Flag data accessed by unauthorized identities
recommended_actions: Map and catalog datasets with sensitivity labels
Integrate DLP hooks with cloud storage providers

title: Network Segmentation — Lateral Movement Controls
intent: Limit east-west traffic and enforce micro-perimeters around critical assets.
automation_hints: Alert on SMB/Remote Desktop traffic originating from low-risk zones
Automate firewall rule updates when segment boundaries shift
recommended_actions: Deploy IDS/IPS sensors at segment egress

title: Third-Party/Vendor Risk Assessment
intent: Continuously monitor third-party code changes, build pipelines, and interfaces for suspicious modifications.
automation_hints: Scan vendor artifacts for anomalies and checksum mismatches
Score vendors by historical incident frequency
recommended_actions: Rotate CI/CD credentials tied to high-risk suppliers
